description:
RARELY OFFERED ON MARKET, COMMUNITY LIFESTYLE
Retirees/Investors, delight in this impressive three bedroom home situated within the prestigious 'Belleview' complex that provides the perfect neighbourly community in a quiet, secure setting. The perfect private oasis.
Home comprises open plan living, kitchen and dining area opening out to undercover courtyard area. Well-designed kitchen with island bench and breakfast bar. Equipped with quality appliances including, dishwasher, gas cook-top and electric oven. Three spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite.
Other features include gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, drive through garage, screen door and much more.
Lovely garden aspect. Located across from the local recreation area within minutes to all that Drysdale has to offer.

Family Special With Room to Move!
Contact Sean Crimmins for your private inspection
Situated in a sought after location this sizeable 4 bedroom home with open plan convenience and multiple living spaces is ideal for the growing or established family!
Features Include:
- 4 bedrooms with built in robes
- Master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Separate spacious living areas
- Open plan dining
- Kitchen with ample bench/cupboard space and premium appliances
- Outdoor entertaining is well serviced with patios to the front and rear of home
- Plenty of yard space
- Manual roller gate
Contact Sean Crimmins for further information

Modern home on ¼ Acre! (approx.)
This great family home will meet all your requirements with all the boxes ticked!
Located in a quiet area, this home may be the perfect peaceful abode that you have been longing for. Enjoy the benefits of a slow, peaceful environment, with the convenience of shops a short distance away.
This property features:
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and spacious ensuite with spa bath
- Large central bathroom
- Generous kitchen with ample bench space and stainless-steel appliances
- Open plan living/dining area with split system heating/cooling
- Ducted heating
- Drive through into a large rear yard with tin garage
- Large pergola down the side of the home
This property is the perfect home for families, first home buyers, downsizers and retirees.
For further details contact Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 anytime.

Ready to Build your dream home! Titles Now available.
LOT 3 | Interest rates are dropping making land even more affordable! A rare opportunity to build your dream home where your money is safely invested into your future, lifestyle and in the heart of most sought after and safest places 'Australia'.
You will not want to miss out on securing this prime piece of land on 724sqm (approx), just moments from all that Crib Point has to offer; coastal walking trails, shops, sporting grounds, schools and public transport. Watch the sunrise as it rises over French Island.
~ All services are available.
~ Individually titled.
~ No overhanging wires down Cavell Way.
~ Fertile soil. Watch the orchids grow.
Also available to purchase:

Lot 6/33 Lorimer Street, Crib Point - 666sqm (SOLD)

A treasured piece of history!
A treasured home that delivers heart warming memories for the many residents that know it very well from it's past being a local Milk bar/fish and chip shop, where children would visit and purchase their treat of lollies and teenagers would hang out listening to music on the jukebox.
Moving forward to today, it has been a much loved home delivering a relaxed low maintenance lifestyle.
~ The home instantly greets you with plenty of character with the decorative cast iron detailing from the balcony along with established and private garden entrance leading through to the rear yard.
~ Formal lounge with exposed beams, feature wall plus built in study nook.
~ Functional kitchen to include walk in pantry, dishwasher plus an adjoining dedicated meals area.
~ Large laundry with adjoining powder room plus external access to the rear yard
~ Accommodation on the upper level encompasses an expansive main bedroom with floor to ceiling mirrored robes, open ensuited area along with a private balcony
~ 2 further bedrooms providing robe and storage space
~ Central main bathroom with free standing claw bath and overhead shower, vanity and WC
~ Externally provides a huge tandem garage/workshop, secure rear yard plus undercover entertaining area.
Located within a well established family community and with close proximity to schools, Woolley's Beach shops and reserves, this home is the perfect start.
Please contact Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718 or email richard@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.
https://robertsandgreen.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Terms-and-Condition-for-Private-Inspections.pdf

address: 267 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Classic Weatherboard With Endless Potential
Instantly captivating, this charming weatherboard cottage filled with gorgeous character and history is a genuine treasure. Set on a generous 507m2 (approx) allotment, the original old charm of the home is present throughout and lends is itself perfectly to renovate and/or extend to create a heart warming family home (STCA).
~ Light and bright living room provides comfortable area to relax and provides the comforts of heating and cooling.
~ The neat and tidy functional kitchen fitted with upright oven overlooks the rear yard.
~ 2 generous sized bedrooms
~ Central family bathroom fitted with vanity, shower over bath and adjoining WC.
~ Delightful child-friendly secure yard with access from the front yard, being ideal for boat, trailer or caravan storage.
Surrounded by plenty of amazing lifestyle options including beautiful beaches, schools, trendy cafes and shops all nearby, this well located property offers an outstanding opportunity for first home buyers, investors or renovators to secure a piece of history.

Modern Dream, Luxury Living!
Beautifully appointed and showcasing contemporary clean lines, enjoy the simplicity this luxury residence has to offer. Full of natural light and complemented by a stunning façade with silvertop ash batten and board cladding this home is in a league of it's own.
~ Step inside the wide entrance and admire the Messmate timber flooring creating a beautiful visual connection as the eye is drawn through to the stylish, light-filed open plan living and dining area complete with the comfort of wood fire.
~ At the heart of the home sits a sophisticated kitchen complete with stone benches, large Island bench, walk in pantry and plenty of storage space.
~ An expansive master bedroom is designed with an open walk around his/her robe, luxurious ensuite fitted with double shower, recycled timber vanity with stone basin.
~2 further carpeted bedrooms with built in robes, along with a separate study and/or 4th bedroom.
~ The sleek main bathroom is tastefully styled having floor to ceiling tiles, black tap ware, semi-frameless shower, separate bath and stone bench.
~ The home provides all the modern comforts to include ducted heating throughout, air-conditioning in the living room, ceiling fans fitted to all bedrooms (not study).
~ The sliding doors from the living room open onto the beautiful and private alfresco area with the wrap around decking, which overlooks out to lush garden surrounds.
~ Set on ½ an acre, the home is complete with double garage providing additional storage shelving, rear block access, solar panels, veggie garden and chook pen.
Superbly located being only minutes to the foreshore, schools and shops, this one of a kind dream home will certainly impress.
Please contact Lisa Roberts on 0488 910 368 or email lisa@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.
https://robertsandgreen.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Terms-and-Condition-for-Private-Inspections.pdf

Spectacular Family Home
*This property is available to inspect at any time by appointment*
One of Crib Point's finest. This high end renovation combines old world charm with new, on a sizeable 1061m2 (approx) block of green grass and manicured gardens. With a brand new bitumen driveway & a fresh coat of paint, not a cent needs to be spent. Simply move in and enjoy.
Some of the key features:
- 4 bedrooms with built in robes
- Central bathroom with bath, shower & under floor heating
- Separate powder room
- Secure garage + double carport
- 2 separate living areas
- 900mm kitchen appliances with stone benches
- 1061m2 (approx) block
- Large deck for outdoor entertaining
- Ducted heating, gas log fireplace & split system cooling
- LED downlights, plantation shutters, polished wood floors & abundance of natural light
- Plenty of off street parking for boats/vans/trailers/cars.
Walking distance to local shops, public transport and schools. This spectacular property is tucked away at the end of a one way street, a hidden family oasis to create memories for years to come.

Practical By Nature, Flawless By Design.
Situated in one of Crib Point's most sought after locales, moments from cafes, transport, shops and schools. This flawlessly renovated and refurbished federation style home is ideal for those looking for a unique and attractive property with a practical floor plan and room to move!
Features Include:
- 3 Bedrooms with built in robes
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- Kitchen with premium appliances and ample bench/cupboard space
- Spacious living area, open plan dining area
- Period style details throughout
- Family sized bathroom
- Sizeable deck with barbecue and bar fridge included
- Established gardens and landscaping
- Plenty of rear yard space
- Around 2 km to Stony Point boat ramp
- Double 2.8 metre clearance carport - ample room for boat or caravan!
Contact Sean Crimmins 0411 734 814 for further info!

Calling All First Home Buyers and Investors
Located in a convenient pocket in family-favourite Crib Point is this three-bedroom double brick home on a generous 770sqm (approx.) allotment.
Embellished with a picket fence and neat front garden offering attractive street appeal, this home combines space, functionality and location to offer a perfect first home or opportunity for the savvy investor.
~ Generous master bedroom with walk-in-robes and ensuite.
~ Further two bedrooms with built-in-robes and serviced by the central bathroom.
~ Large country-style kitchen offering built-in oven, island bench and ample storage space.
~ Spacious living area opening into the undercover outdoor entertaining area.
~ Climate controlled with gas heating and split system heating and cooling; also being double brick, remains warm in Winter and cool in Summer.
~ Oversized laundry/utility room.
~ Double tandem carport, offering an abundance of off-street parking as well as a long, sealed driveway.
~ Sprawling child-friendly backyard complete with fruit trees, garden shed and a cubby house which could also be utilised as further storage.
Currently tenanted with a rental return of $1629 per calendar month, this property is an excellent investment opportunity.
Please contact Wilma Green on 0407 833 996 or email wilma@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.
https://robertsandgreen.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Terms-and-Condition-for-Private-Inspections.pdf

Feels Like Home - Entertainers Delight
Nestled in this quiet and established neighbourhood, sits this completed home which has been renovated with modern colour tones, fresh flooring & updated appliances. 'The perfect move in and relax scenario.'
This home is sure to impress with its soft colour palette and a functional design comprising of an inviting living room, combined kitchen/meals area, three comfortable bedrooms alongside the family bathroom and laundry.
Wow! The mancave (entertaining space to the rear) is perfect for entertaining, quiet time, storage or working from home. Complete with a bar, water, power, space for a billiard table and dimmable downlights throughout.
Situated on a large 738msq block, this home screams potential to first home buyers, savvy investors, and future conscious downsizers.
This home includes:
- Separate gate with concrete driveway to the side of the property perfect for a caravan, boat, or RV. 150mm thick and reinforced with Rio. Approx. 25m in length and 3.5m wide
- Renovated Kitchen with Caesar stone benchtops and stainless-steel appliances
- Coonarra styled wood heater and separate heating/cooling
- Large 'back to grid' solar system with 22 solar panels
- Private front fence with remote gate
- Remote-controlled awning to the front of the property
- Large covered deck to the rear with built in benches and refrigerator
Only upon inspection can you really truly appreciate everything this ideal home has to offer.

Calling On All Investors, Big Rental Yield
Calling On All Investors, Estimated Rental Yield 5%, Approx $ $380.00 per week.
Discerning downsizes, investors and first home buyers will relish the chance to secure this low maintenance single level unit. Promising everything you need for a lifestyle of ease and convenience the unit provides all the modern comforts to include:
~ Sun splashed formal living space
~ Well equipped kitchen with stainless appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar plus ample cupboard space
~ Spacious tiled meals area leading out to your private courtyard
~ 3 generous size carpeted bedrooms all with built in robes
~ Central family bathroom complete with shower, bath and vanity.
~ Substantial private courtyard with exposed aggregate, low maintenance garden surrounds plus garden shed
~ Further comforts included Fujitsu split system heating and cooling, separate laundry & WC, secure single lock up garage with internal access.
Positioned within close proximity of the beach, schools, recreational reserves and shops there's no more to do than move in and enjoy all this popular locale has to offer.
Please contact Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718 or email richard@robertsandgreen.com.au to arrange a private inspection of this property.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.
https://robertsandgreen.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Terms-and-Condition-for-Private-Inspections.pdf

Opportunity Awaits on Huge 1012sqm Block!
An enormous allotment of approximately 1012 m2 ensures this well-presented, original family home offers an exciting array of future options for those seeking to renovate or extend, simply land bank & live, or even redevelop (STCA) set in a quiet leafy location.
This substantial family home comprises three sizeable bedrooms all with built in robes, plus an additional study or fourth bedroom. The central timber kitchen offers electric appliances adjoins to the L-shaped lounge room and overlooks the separate dining zone.
Aspiring entertainers will be delighted by the large backyard with established gardens, the perfect setting by which to host family and friends on a summers afternoon. A double lock up garage and cooling all complete the package.
This outstanding opportunity is made even better by its prized location, within easy reach of Morradoo Train Station, public transport and local shops.

Please phone 5979 2489 or email reception@robertsandgreen.com.au to register your attendance at this weekends open home.
Country Charm Set Amongst Lush Tranquillity
A stunning country-inspired residence tucked away in leafy surrounds. This well-presented family home boasts high ceilings throughout and offers ample space both inside and out, perfect for a growing family or entertaining family and friends.
Set on a substantial allotment of 1619sqm (approx.) and located within close proximity to schools, shops and transport, this property is sure to impress from the first moment and will make a perfect future subdivision (STCA) to top up your retirement savings.
~ Generous master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite.
~ Newly renovated main bathroom servicing remaining two bedrooms.
~ Remarkable timber kitchen adjoining the family/meals area, featuring ample storage and generous bench space, complimented by a large servery window accessing the outdoor entertaining area.
~ Functional living room which leads out to the beautiful park like settings through seamless French doors.
~ Sealed driveway, single carport and workshop with plenty of storage.
~ Large child-friendly yard.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.

address: 362 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Please phone 5979 2489 or email reception@robertsandgreen.com.au to register your attendance at this weekends open home.
Affordability, Location And Convenience Combined
Located in family-favourite Crib Point, within close proximity to schools, transport and sporting facilities, this brick veneer property is the perfect starter for first home buyers or astute investors.
Set on a generous allotment of approximately 777sqm and offering a large, child friendly backyard, growing families will find themselves at home with room to move.
~ Three generous bedrooms with built in robes.
~ Spacious kitchen with dishwasher and ample storage.
~ Central bathroom complete with separate bath and shower.
~Climate controlled with ceiling fans, split system heating and cooling and gas wall heater.
~ Large undercover outdoor entertaining area overlooking the enclosed backyard with garden shed.
Please click through the below link to view our terms and conditions for all inspections.

A Captivating Tranquil Sanctuary
Carefully thought out and demonstrating an impressive attention to detail, this property will have you delighted from the moment you lay eyes on it. As you approach the residence through the Japanese inspired gardens, you can immediately appreciate the intricate detail that has been applied to present this stunning, unique home.
With functionality in mind, the design boasts concrete floors with hydronic heating and a raised oak kitchen floor to ensure optimum comfort while preparing meals for your family and friends, a sprawling open plan living and dining area and separate upstairs teenagers retreat, providing space and privacy for every member of the family. The passive design of the home also means that heating and cooling costs are kept to a minimum.
Downstairs:
~ Spacious study situated at the front of the property.
~ Open plan living and dining area, opening out onto the immaculate courtyard.
~ Toughened glass sache windows, offering flow through cross ventilation.
~ Gourmet kitchen with raised engineered oak flooring.
~ Master suite complete with built in robes, floor to ceiling windows and ensuite.
~ 2.7-3.7metre ceilings and polished concrete floors.
~ Climate controlled with hydronic heating, ceiling fans and extra insulation.
Upstairs:
~ Generous living area.
~ Bathroom equipped with toilet and shower.
~ Two further bedrooms.
~ Carpeted throughout.
~ High set windows ensuring privacy, yet still allowing the natural light to bathe the area.
Outdoors:
~ Immaculate paved terrace, with seamless indoor/outdoor living through the glass sliding doors, provides an abundance of privacy in a peaceful setting.
~ Japanese inspired landscaping including a zen water feature.
~ Recycled posts from the old Hastings pier form part of the outdoor landscape.
"INSPECTION BY PRIVATE APPOINTMENT"

Room to Move
Inspect by Private Appointment Only.
Beyond the well-presented character façade, a welcoming, light filled and spacious interior awaits. With 5 great sized bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this weatherboard residence will suit the family seeking just the right mix of comfort, practicality and location.
Central to the home is a spacious kitchen overlooking an open-plan meals, dining and living area, perfectly accommodating the whole family whilst preparing meals, completing homework or simply relaxing at the end of the day.
The master bedroom includes a walk-in robe and ensuite, while a further four bedrooms feature built in robes, roller blinds and newly installed carpets. The extras continue with ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ceiling fans, and new flooring throughout.
Stepping outside, the appeal continues with a large undercover decked entertaining area, great yard for the kids to play, garden shed and secure private yard.
Complete with carport and plenty of room for open parking, all of this set on a 1012m2 (approx.) block. This is an ideal opportunity to secure this centrally located home nestled in a quiet enclave conveniently located moments to Dartnell Reserve and from shops, schools and transport.
Currently under tenancy to October, this is a ready to go investment property or a fantastic opportunity to secure a family home on a large parcel of land.

Location Perfect - Rural Feel
This immaculately presented 3 bedroom villa has been built with quality workmanship and a modern facade in mind.
Features include a designer kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, including dishwasher.
Open plan dining area and separate lounge room.
Main bedroom features walk in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms have built in robes.
Tiled wet areas and carpet to bedrooms, ducted evaporative cooling and R/C heating.
Outside features decking area, outdoor blinds either can be open or closed and surrounded by landscaped gardens, back and front.
Double remote garage and secure parking is available for guests.
Perfectly located to heart of Crib Point, pool and park surrounds, makes this location perfect.

address: 347 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Large Block - Big Opportunity
This 2 bedroom property is set on a huge 908m2 corner block. Situated in a convenient location that's walking distance to local shops, bus stops & train station, as well as local schools and reserves.
Property Features:
- 2 bedrooms
- Bathroom with separate W.C
- 908m2 (approx.) block
- High vaulted ceilings
- Coonara + reverse cycle split system
- Large shed/garage
- Established trees and private rear yard (with side access)
Move in now, renovate later, this property is ideal for first home buyers, investors or downsizers and has plenty of scope to make it your own.

Central with Style and Space!
Situated close to all amenities this lovingly updated and renovated home is ideal for first home buyers, young families and investors!
Features Include:
- Tastefully remodelled throughout
- 3 bedrooms with built in robes
- Bathroom with freestanding bath, custom vanity and ample lighting
- Heating and cooling
- Kitchen with ample bench/cupboard space and premium appliances
- Outdoor patio and plenty of yard space
- Single carport, established gardens
Contact Sean Crimmins 0411 734 814 for further info!
